Name: non-alcoholic fatty liver
Definition: A nonalcoholic fatty liver disease that is characterized by the presence of at least 5% of hepatic steatosis with no evidence of hepatocellular injury in the form of hepatocyte ballooning.

Name: non-alcoholic steatohepatitis
Definition: A nonalcoholic fatty liver disease that is characterized by the presence of inflammation with hepatocyte injury such as ballooning
